title: 82: The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley
itunes:title: The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley
description:
With a magical new invention that promised to revolutionize blood testing, 19 year old Elizabeth Holmes became the world's youngest self-made billionaire, heralded as the next Steve Jobs. Then, overnight, it was revealed that the technology she'd invented didn't work--it never had. Her $10-billion-dollar company dissolved, investors lost everything, and Holmes now faces jail time.
